## SetupAPI.postSetup() method

Set up initial user, org and bucket. See [https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/\#operation/PostSetup](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/#operation/PostSetup)

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
